channel.title: Need help had this error for ages (need answers)
channel.description:
hi i have made a client with galkons base but had a error so i made it a JAR FILE i double click the jar and it says it cant find the main class client But i have client.class in the file same thing in run.bat it says Cant find the main class client
In my run.bat edit bit it says [code]@ECHO OFF TITLE Galkons Base JAVA -Xmx500m client pause [/code]
PLEASE HELP WAT DO I DO[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2008, 11:49:56 am[/size][hr]I NEED A ANSWER PLZ ANY WHAT DO U SUGGEST

item.title: Need help had this error for ages (need answers)
item.dc:creator: @bman1249 bman1249
item.description:
@bman1249 wrote:

What you have to do is run a srever.bat from a private server source then it should work just fine I just played with it a bit and figured that out.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help had this error for ages (need answers)

item.title: Need help had this error for ages (need answers)
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Maybe you did not jar it correctly; make sure you specified witch class was the main class while jarring your client.

bman1249:

i can’t help but i have the same problem that you have.=(

That’s just spam. Please do not bother to post things that are no help to anyone.

Read full topic
